programme.title: POV
programme.desc: 5 Broken Cameras. "5 Broken Cameras" relates the story of Palestinian farmer Emad Burnat, who bought a video camera in 2005 to record his and his wife's new baby, and wound up using it to also document his village's protests against Israel's security fence, which cut through the community's farmlands, and the expansion plan of a nearby Israeli settlement. The film takes its name from the number of video cameras that Burnat used. Two were shot; a third broken by a settler; and a fourth damaged in an auto accident

programme.title: Craft in America
programme.desc: Origins. The origins and traditions of the American craft movement are explored via profiles of craft artists, including blacksmith Philip Simmons, potter Vernon Owens, beadworker Teri Greeves, weaver Jim Bassler and glass artist Paul Stankard

programme.title: Craft in America
programme.desc: Process. How to learn a craft and make a living from it, featuring New York City's 92nd Street Y director of jewelry and metalsmithing, Jonathan Wahl; director of ceramics Robert "Bobby" Silverman; Kansas City Art Institute professor Cary Esser; Boston's North Bennet Street School director Miguel Gómez-Ibáñez; book artist Julie Chen; book artist-printmaker Tom Killion; and jewelers David and Roberta Williamson

programme.title: Craft in America
programme.desc: Messages. A look at craft artists who tell stories, make points and bring attention to issues through their work. Included: glass artist Beth Lipman, whose art features 17th-century Dutch still-life symbolism; New Mexico santero Charles M. Carrillo, who combines the historic with the modern; bead artist Joyce J. Scott, whose art focuses on such issues as race and stereotyping; and jewelry artist-sculptor Thomas Mann, who created wall panels to tell stories about New Orleans post-Katrina

programme.title: Craft in America
programme.desc: Threads. Profiling textile artists Terese Agnew, Randall Darwall, Faith Ringgold and Consuelo Jimenez Underwood. Agnew creates quilts that explore environmental and political themes; colorist-weaver Darwall makes cloth that becomes a kinetic sculpture when worn; Ringgold creates painted story quilts; and Underwood uses weaving, sewing, painting and appliqué to create woven "corridos" focused on political and physical strife

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Between the Bread. Sandwiches are highlighted during a trip to Colorado Springs, where a Pueblo chili burger is tasted by Guy. Later, the host tries a corned beef hoagie and porchetta in Washington, D.C.; and savory tequila shrimp, pork and brisket are eaten at an Atlantic City pub

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Serious Sandwiches. Duck pastrami is sampled at a gourmet sandwich shop in Austin. The host also eats Cajun roast-beef po'boys in Las Vegas and stuffed burgers in St. Paul

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Succulent Sandwiches. Guy seeks out succulent sandwiches during his travels. Included: cheesesteak and chicken at a butchery in Oakland; a food truck in Modesto, Cal., with pastrami on pretzel bread and pulled pork cooked in root beer; and a seafood staple in Key Largo, Fla

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Sammies and Stew. This trip, Guy's digging into some super sandwiches and savoury stew. In Santa Fe there's a cafe with a native Kenyan in the kitchen serving up fresh fish, such as island spiced banana leaf mahi mahi

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Super Sandwiches. Guy shares his favorite sandwich experiences. Included: po'boys with chef Emeril Lagasse; Venezuelan arepas; duck French dip; lobster on a bun; and pastrami from a Belgian restaurant in San Carlos, Cal

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Seafood & Sammies. This trip, Guy's going for surf and turf between the slices. In Vancouver, British Columbia, a food truck shuckin' and frying oysters for a po boy and topping crispy fries with a mean seafood chowder. In Detroit, Michigan, the 18,000 foot joint giving savory brisket a beer batter bath and a place on a fresh panini. And in Chicago, Illinois, the Italian market scratch making meats for the meatball hero and the crispy porchetta sandwich

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Streamlined Sammies. This trip, Guy's pullin' right up to the window and digging in. In Austin, Texas, there's a tiny trailer serving up scratch-made sammies to customers on the street and in the bar next door. In Minneapolis, a food truck cranks out fresh lobster rolls that do double duty in a dive bar. And in Dallas, a side-of-the-road joint focuses on one thing only: burgers

programme.title: City by the Sea
programme.desc: A man struggling to come to terms with the sins of his father makes the terrible discovery that his own son has fallen into a life of crime in a drama based on a true story. Vincent LaMarca (Robert DeNiro) is a dedicated and well-respected New York City police detective who has gone to great lengths to distance himself from his past; four decades earlier, Vincent's father Angelo killed a young child, and since then Vincent has carried emotional scars from this incident that he refuses to show to the world. Vincent lives alone in a small apartment building, though he has nurtured a close if tentative relationship with his downstairs neighbor, Michelle (Frances McDormand). One day, Vincent and his partner, Reg Duffy (George Dzundza), are assigned to investigate a murder when the body of a young man is found dead in a dumpster. It turns out the body was that of a drug dealer, and the dealer's partner in crime, Spyder (William Forsythe), believes the killer was one of his regular customers -- a junkie would-be musician who calls himself Snake (Brian Tarantina). City By the Sea was adapted from a piece by journalist Mike McAlary which first appeared in Esquire magazine; the cast also includes Eliza Dushku and Anson Mount(n)

With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars in this ethereal drama based on the best-selling novel about a family of repressed teenaged girls in the 1970s who take drastic action to escape their restrictive home life. Danny DeVito, Josh Hartnett, Kathleen Turner and James Woods costar in the directorial debut of Sofia Coppola(n)

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Nicole Kidman star in this drama about a former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, and sets out many years later to confront the man responsible(n)

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: A newspaper cartoonist becomes obsessed with solving San Francisco's infamous "Zodiac" serial killer case, and eventually closes in on a suspect after the case has long become cold in this fact-based thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr. and Chloe Sevigny(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars in this tale based on the true story of Alan Turing, a genius British mathematician, who works against the clock to crack Germany's infamously unbreakable codes during World War II and defies convention in his personal life. Also stars Keira Knightley(n)

programme.title: In the Arena
programme.desc: The jeers and boos of Sanders diehards ring out in Philadelphia, before the Democrats at last make Hillary a historic nominee. But is shattering a glass ceiling enough for Clinton and Kaine to unite the party into a winning coalition?(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley

programme.title: Exorcismus
programme.desc: Spanish horror film about a fifteen year old girl who falls prey to a series of seizures that leave doctors baffled, forcing her parents to summon a priest to deal with the sinister forces lurking within her

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wet Foot/Dry Foot
programme.desc: Two Cuban refugees attempting to reach the United States on a handmade raft find themselves stranded on a deserted island off the Florida coast in the winning short film from this year's competition

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: The Hybrid
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries are chosen to carry out a covert operation deep in a former Soviet State that sends them into a maze of tunnels inhabited by menacing creatures and towards an underground laboratory where they must secure specimens of genetically engineered human and alien hybrids

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: In this Australian horror flick a young nurse begins work at an isolated psychiatric ward, and quickly becomes fascinated with a brain dead patient who is the subject of a mad scientist's cruel and unusual experiments. What starts as an innocent fascination quickly takes a sinister turn, as the patient begins to use his psychic powers to manipulate her every move(n)

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: In this chilling supernatural tale, a talented young photographer with a disfiguring birthmark discovers a world of reptilian monsters posing as street gangs on the streets of London, who inflict violence on the innocent and offer him everything he's ever dreamed of, but at a deadly price(n)

programme.title: Dark Hearts
programme.desc: When a struggling artist finds his muse in a sultry singer at an underground nightclub, their daring romance spirals out of control into a dangerous game of deception and betrayal(n)

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left(n)

programme.title: Reaper
programme.desc: When a death row inmate survives his execution and returns as a supernatural, unholy creature, a mysterious community of drifters and criminals must band together to defeat the monster or perish in the depths of hell(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Days (2004)
programme.desc: Adventure comedy starring Jackie Chan and Steve Coogan based on the Jules Verne novel. Set in 19th century Britain, an inventor wagers an outrageous bet that he can circle the globe in 80 days, which leads him and his sidekick on an exhilarating and exotic journey filled with obstacles and outlandish predicaments(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell(n)

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: Set in a pulp comic styled glamorous 1930s, a down-on-his-luck pilot stumbles upon an incredible invention -- a top-secret jetpack -- but before long, a sinister spy interferes and the pilot must embark on a thrilling and dangerous mission. Stars Timothy Dalton and Jennifer Connelly(n)

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet, a lucky few board a train that endlessly circles the icy globe but with a cruel and dangerous class hierarchy separating the front from the back passengers, a rebel hero stirs up a riot to challenge the system. Features an all-star cast, including Tilda Swinton, Octavia Spencer, Chris Evans and John Hurt(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier
programme.desc: A crime drama based on true events that follows the rise of Carlton Leach, one of the most feared thugs of the London and Essex soccer world, as he goes from a life of hooliganism to becoming a member of a notorious gang that rampaged the scene in the late 80s

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor stars in this by-turns shocking and hilarious comedy-drama about heroin addicted Scots, the sophomore feature of filmmaker Danny Boyle ("Shallow Grave"). He's Mark Renton, a junkie who loves his drug of choice and the exciting lifestyle it requires. Still, Mark knows his future's not very bright, so he kicks the habit and gets a real job, but his buddies Sick Boy (Jonny Lee Miller), Spud (Ewen Bremner) and Begbie (Robert Carlyle) drag him reluctantly back into his old ways. Based on the novel by Irvine Welsh

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: Val Kilmer stars as a famed scientist who unearths a prehistoric specimen in the Arctic that soon unleashes a swarm of dangerous parasites, forcing himself and his students to quarantine themselves or risk infecting the world

programme.title: Common
programme.desc: A guileless 17-year old goes from innocent bystander to accessory to premeditated murder after giving a few friends a lift in this gritty drama starring Michael Gambon, Michelle Fairley and Johnjo O'Shea

programme.title: Echoes of War
programme.desc: A Civil War veteran returns home to the quiet countryside, only to find himself embroiled in a conflict between his family and the cattle rancher neighbors

programme.title: LEAVE THE WORLD BEHIND: Swedish House Mafia's Final Tour
programme.desc: Documentary following electronic super band Swedish House Mafia on their final tour before they call it quits that offers a rare look at the electronic music world, with breathtaking live footage and behind-the-scenes drama of three musicians who walk away from everything to save their friendship

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: Documentary charting the raucous history of the infamous spring vacation revelries in Daytona, which started in the early 60s, and by the 1980s led to the arrival of tens of thousands of college students, lured by lust, booze, fun in the sun and eventually, the hope to make it onto MTV

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
programme.desc: Stand up comedian Pete Correale explores the absurdities of life, love and marriage in his hilarious comedy special where he gives his homegrown New Yorker take on everything from the joy of ice cream to the pain of political correctness

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: This rawboned action conspiracy thriller stars Mark Wahlberg as a former Marine Corps sniper Bob Lee Swagger, who answers his country's call when a retired colonel (Danny Glover) enlists him to stop a presidential assassin. The twist is that Bob Lee finds himself tagged as the patsy in a murderous conspiracy, with only an FBI rookie (Michael Pena) on his side

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller

programme.title: NYC Underground
programme.desc: When a group of friends make the trek across town to a Brooklyn concert, they become embroiled in a drug deal that goes awry, leaving them to flee through New York City's labyrinthine subway system in a race of life or death

programme.title: Need For Speed
programme.desc: Aaron Paul stars as a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate. Now, fresh from prison, he gets his hands on the fastest car around and joins a secretive and extremely high stakes race with revenge in mind, in this story of love, redemption and super fast cars(n)

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: This rawboned action conspiracy thriller stars Mark Wahlberg as a former Marine Corps sniper Bob Lee Swagger, who answers his country's call when a retired colonel (Danny Glover) enlists him to stop a presidential assassin. The twist is that Bob Lee finds himself tagged as the patsy in a murderous conspiracy, with only an FBI rookie (Michael Pena) on his side(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Frank Miller's classic graphic novels return to the screen, weaving together gritty tales that feature Basin City's most hardboiled citizens as they cross paths with the town's more notorious inhabitants. Stars Jessica Alba, Josh Brolin and Mickey Rourke(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller(n)

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Filmed over 12 years with the same cast, this groundbreaking Richard Linklater film is the story of growing up seen through the eyes of a boy who literally goes from a child to a young adult before our eyes. Features Patricia Arquette in her Oscar® winning role with Ethan Hawke and Ellar Coltrane(n)

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: A musician is left reeling after her boyfriend strays but her life takes a turn when a disgraced record-label exec stumbles upon her performing in the East Village, and a chance encounter leads to a wondrous mutual transformation, set to the soundtrack of summer in New York City. Stars Keira Knightley and Mark Ruffalo(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comedy-drama based on the acclaimed novel about an English professor (Michael Douglas) who can't stop writing his new manuscript while he grapples over the holidays with his pregnant mistress (Frances McDormand), a gifted but troubled student (Tobey Maguire), a beautiful houseguest (Katie Holmes), a stolen car and his high-pressure, gay editor (Robert Downey Jr.). Rip Torn and Richard Thomas costar in this acclaimed, Oscar-winning film from the director of "L.A. Confidential."(n)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. Also stars Kathryn Hahn and Jeffrey Tambor(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones(n)

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen(n)

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: A quirky comedy starring Bill Murray as a hedonistic war veteran, with a penchant for alcohol and gambling, who is entrusted with babysitting the 12-year-old boy next door. As the improbable pair develops a friendship both of them learn to grow up, in unexpected ways. Also stars Melissa McCarthy and Naomi Watts

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: A chilling sequel to "The Silence of the Lambs" starring Anthony Hopkins as genius serial killer Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter, resurfacing after a decade in hiding to contact his old nemesis Clarice Starling (Julianne Moore), who's now an FBI agent with career trouble. As he dodges both a greedy Italian police detective and a powerful but vengefully demented former victim, Hannibal plots to "help" Clarice in the most grisly fashion possible. Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta costar

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: A dentist (Dane Cook) who is also a lifelong bachelor suddenly realizes at an ex-girlfriend's wedding that every woman he's ever slept with has found her true love with the very next man she dated - making him instant catnip to ladies only interested in benefiting from his "curse." Jessica Alba and Dan Fogler costar in this romantic comedy

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: Blue collar comedy rules the roost with this hilarious farce starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall and D.J. Qualls as buddies who are mistaken for Army Reservists and sent to the Middle East - but when they are accidentally dropped into Mexico, they misread the situation and set about trying to "liberate" a besieged village from a demented drug lord. Danny Trejo costars

programme.title: Sicko
programme.desc: Documentary filmmaker Michael Moore, that lightning rod of sociopolitical controversy, continues his provocative cinematic crusade with this incendiary, highly critical examination of the greed fueling America's private enterprise health care system

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars in this thriller as Tom Ripley, a social schemer using his genius to forge a relationship with Dickie Greenleaf (Jude Law) and his girlfriend Marge (Gwyneth Paltrow), two bright, beautiful and wealthy young people who have everything Tom would literally kill for. Philip Seymour Hoffman and Cate Blanchett costar in this critically acclaimed film from director Anthony Minghella ("The English Patient") that was nominated for five Academy Awards

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Christian Bale star in this blazing Western remake as, respectively, a daring outlaw and the humble farmer deputized to deliver him to justice. Peter Fonda, Gretchen Mol, Ben Foster and Alan Tudyk costar in this acclaimed frontier adventure

programme.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars as an oceanographer out to exact revenge on a mythical shark by rallying a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist and a man who may or may not be his son in this Wes Anderson comedy. Also stars Owen Wilson, Cate Blanchett, Anjelica Huston and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson(n)

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: Robert DeNiro and John Travolta star as two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- who find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions(n)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter(n)

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc: A simple case of mistaken identity lands a smart-aleck hero named Slevin (Josh Hartnett) in the middle of a New York gang war where nobody is who he or she seems to be. Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Morgan Freeman, Ben Kingsley and Stanley Tucci costar in this crackling puzzle of a thriller from director Paul McGuigan(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes(n)

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: While he's trapped in a diner during a freak Colorado snowstorm, the U.S. President (Kevin Pollak) debates strategy with his senior staff during an international crisis provoked by Iraq. Sean Astin, Timothy Hutton and Sheryl Lee Ralph costar in this debut feature from writer-director Rod Lurie ("The Contender")(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn(n)

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
programme.desc: Stand up comedian Pete Correale explores the absurdities of life, love and marriage in his hilarious comedy special where he gives his homegrown New Yorker take on everything from the joy of ice cream to the pain of political correctness(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family(n)

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn(n)

programme.title: Exercise vs. Genetics
programme.desc: In episode 212, the magicians explore the role of genetics in determining body shape and size, throwing into doubt the claims of an exercise industry reaping billions in profits from gym memberships, dietary supplements and best-selling books

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar

programme.title: Erotic Fashion Show
programme.desc: When an aspiring fashion designer comes to the attention of a major brand, she can't believe her luck and soon a glamorous new world filled with lusts and desires she'd never dreamed of opens up for her

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Santa Cruz vs. Frampton (?)
The Surface
programme.desc: When a small plane crashes in the unpredictable waters of Lake Michigan and the pilot is pulled from the wreckage by a man stranded aboard a boat, the two men must overcome their differences to fight the harsh elements and make it back to shore

programme.title: The Spymasters - CIA in the Crosshairs
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the inner workings of the world's most powerful intelligence organization, with unprecedented access to America's spy network, all 12 living CIA directors and top agency operatives, who talk candidly about torture, secret prisons, drone warfare, alleged assassinations and the constant threat of attack, which begs the question: how far should America go to keep us safe? Narrated by Mandy Patinkin ('Homeland')

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft (Angelina Jolie) is a buxom cross between Indiana Jones and James Bond, a British aristocrat who makes her living acquiring priceless antiquities by any means necessary. When she discovers that an ancient relic sought by her late father holds the key to power over time, she's quickly strapping on her side arms and hopping the globe, hoping to beat a sinister ancient group called the Illuminati in the quest to recover the artifact. Jon Voight, Iain Glen and Mark Collie costar in this action-packed smash based on a popular video game

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: IVERSON
programme.desc: Feature-length documentary charting the rise of basketball great Allen Iverson, told largely in his own words. From a turbulent childhood of crushing poverty in Virginia to controversial run-ins with the law to iconic Philadelphia 76ers all star, his audacious rejection of convention and off the court embrace of hip-hop sent shockwaves through the NBA and influenced an entire generation

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: Brad Williams: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: In this hilarious new comedy special, stand-up Brad Williams tackles race and political correctness, as well as how his father raised him to deal with adversity

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft (Angelina Jolie) is a buxom cross between Indiana Jones and James Bond, a British aristocrat who makes her living acquiring priceless antiquities by any means necessary. When she discovers that an ancient relic sought by her late father holds the key to power over time, she's quickly strapping on her side arms and hopping the globe, hoping to beat a sinister ancient group called the Illuminati in the quest to recover the artifact. Jon Voight, Iain Glen and Mark Collie costar in this action-packed smash based on a popular video game

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n)

programme.title: Drunk Stoned Brilliant Dead: The Story of the National Lampoon
programme.desc: Documentary reliving National Lampoon's meteoric rise from the go-to humor magazine of the counterculture to a brand that launched Hollywood's biggest comedies, featuring unseen archival footage, beautiful and shocking art, interviews with the magazine's best-known artists and writers and commentary from Judd Apatow, John Goodman, Billy Bob Thornton, Christopher Buckley and Chevy Chase(n)

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: A chilling sequel to "The Silence of the Lambs" starring Anthony Hopkins as genius serial killer Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter, resurfacing after a decade in hiding to contact his old nemesis Clarice Starling (Julianne Moore), who's now an FBI agent with career trouble. As he dodges both a greedy Italian police detective and a powerful but vengefully demented former victim, Hannibal plots to "help" Clarice in the most grisly fashion possible. Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta costar(n)

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds(n)

programme.title: Steve McQueen: The Man & Le Mans
programme.desc: Documentary following iconic movie actor/director Steve McQueen's journey to make 'the ultimate racing movie', Le Mans, in France in the 1970s, which interweaves present day interviews with his family members and production team with remarkable archive footage that goes behind the making of the film that would lead one of the most charismatic stars of all time to lose everything in the pursuit of a dream(n)

programme.title: Split Decisions
programme.desc: The lives of three generations of pugilistic warriors merge in a flurry of corruption with this look at the raw-boned world of professional boxing starring Gene Hackman and a strong supporting cast that includes Craig Sheffer, Jeff Fahey, Jennifer Beals, John McLiam, Eddie Velez, Carmine Caridi and James Tolkan(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature(n)

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: Robert DeNiro and John Travolta star as two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- who find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds(n)

programme.title: Steve McQueen: The Man & Le Mans
programme.desc: Documentary following iconic movie actor/director Steve McQueen's journey to make 'the ultimate racing movie', Le Mans, in France in the 1970s, which interweaves present day interviews with his family members and production team with remarkable archive footage that goes behind the making of the film that would lead one of the most charismatic stars of all time to lose everything in the pursuit of a dream(n)

programme.title: Cleanskin
programme.desc: Sean Bean stars in this action thriller as a burnt out secret service agent who must pursue and eliminate a deadly suicide bomber and dismantle a terrorist cell that is wreaking havoc on the streets of London before they strike again. Also stars Charlotte Rampling(n)

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Anne Heche and Harrison Ford as a New York magazine editor and a gruff pilot who must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island

programme.title: Keeping Up With The Steins
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood battles his terrible shyness as his father wages his own battle to throw a bar mitzvah party that will outdo his rival. But everything is upended when the boy's estranged grandfather arrives in town, in this satire of materialism

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: Knuckleball!
programme.desc: This story of a few good men follows Tim Wakefield and Mets pitcher RA Dickey through the 2011 Major League baseball season as they face struggles unique to the knuckleballer alone. Though scoffed at by peers, discouraged by managers, and overlooked by scouts, these men personify the act of defying conventional wisdom. The knuckler is the everyman of baseball, and in them we see the best versions of ourselves, competing in spite of their failures

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In this futuristic tale where human frequencies determine luck, love, and destiny, a young college student must overcome science in order to love a woman who emits a different frequency than his own

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Quiz Show
programme.desc: In 1957 awkward Herb Stempel (John Turturro) is unseated as reigning champ of TV's popular quiz show Twenty-One. The show's new star is handsome professor Charles Van Doren (Ralph Fiennes), who sends ratings soaring. The show's a fraud, however, and lawyer Richard Goodwin (Rob Morrow) launches a probe that results in scandal. Paul Scofield, David Paymer, Hank Azaria, Christopher McDonald and Mira Sorvino costar in director Robert Redford's acclaimed drama, which earned four Oscar nominations

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris(n)

programme.title: Dragonheart
programme.desc: A story of allegiance between a man of honor and a creature of legend - the very last dragon. Dennis Quaid stars as a knight who, with his companion, an 18-foot high dragon (voiced by Sean Connery), join forces in a heroic battle to free a country from the iron grip of its tyrannical ruler(n)

programme.title: Dragon: Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Based on the life and career of Martial Arts superstar Bruce Lee, this biographical drama chronicles his early training in Hong Kong where an altercation led him to flee to the US where he opened a Martial Arts school and landed a big time movie career, all the while running from the demons of his past(n)

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: Danny Glover stars as a brilliant mathematician who returns to his family home after 30 years away to discover that tragic events from his past may be in danger of repeating themselves. Plagued by déjà vu, he is convinced his young neighbor and her mother are doomed to die on the anniversary of his wife and daughter's deaths. Struggling to unlock the pattern, he tries to convince his brother-in-law, a policeman, of the impending tragedy, but the facts don't add up. Is he losing his mind, or running out of time?(n)

programme.title: Space Warriors

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Adios, Para Siempre

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof

programme.desc: A fourteen-year-old heir (Jonathan Jackson) to dad's corporation faces the wrath of his power-mad uncle (William Shatner), who plots his nephew's overthrow. Don S. Davis costars in this humorous saga loosely based on Anthony Hope's novel(n)

programme.title: Snow Day

programme.title: Houseguest

Guess who's coming to dinner? Jeffrey Jones, Kim Greist, Stan Shaw, Tony Longo, Mason Adams and Ron Glass costar in this zany domestic comedy(n)

programme.title: Return to Nim's Island
programme.desc: In this sequel, Nim, the precocious daughter of a scientist, still has her gift of being one with nature but now that developers and poachers threaten her island, she and her father must fight to preserve their pristine home and its abundant wildlife. Stars Bindi Irwin and John Waters(n)

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film(n)

programme.desc: A beautiful, young woman stuck in a series of mundane relationships has a chance encounter with a handsome and mysterious man who introduces her to an erotic and thrilling new world of self-discovery, but it comes with a price

Martin Landau is the sleazy producer who introduces Wuhl to Robert De Niro, Danny Aiello and Eli Wallach - three guys with money who are willing to invest in the movie. There's just one catch: each one wants his girlfriend to be the star. Putting the deal together and keeping the mistress happy turns into a hilarious expose of the truth about Hollywood

programme.title: Lovesick

With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: Match

Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Yellow Badge of Cowardge. In the series 25 finale, Bart's victory in Springfield Elementary's annual "Race Around the School" leaves him guilt-ridden because he received outside help in achieving his win. Meanwhile, Homer is fired up about getting the Fourth of July fireworks reinstated after they were canceled for budgetary reasons(n)

programme.title: Taking Lives
programme.desc: A female detective on the trail of a psychotic killer discovers love in a dangerous time in this thriller, based on the novel by Michael Pye. Illeana Scott (Angelina Jolie) is a special agent with the FBI who has a reputation for using offbeat methods, but also boasts a strong record as a criminal profiler. Scott is called in by a former Quantico colleague (Tcheky Karyo) to assist two Canadian police detectives, Paquette (Olivier Martinez) and Duval (Jean-Hugues Anglade), who are on the trail of a serial killer who has been doing business in and around Montreal for close to two decades. The murderer has a history of assimilating many aspects of the lives of his victims after he kills them, but there's been a witness to his most recent crime. Art gallery owner James Costa (Ethan Hawke) saw the killer during an assault, and now finds himself working as an only marginally willing decoy for Scott. As Scott and Costa follow the killer's trail, they find themselves becoming attracted to one another, which is not necessarily a comfort to Scott as she finds her quarry moving closer and closer. Taking Lives also stars Kiefer Sutherland and Gena Rowlands(n)

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
