programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle(n)

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: In this sequel to Friday, Ice Cube returns as the streetwise LA dude who grassed up a local gangster. Who's now out and on his trail. This would be a good time to chill out in the suburbs with cousin Mike Epps and uncle Don 'Dc' Curry, who happens to have won the lottery but, as he finds out, money can't buy you love or security in Steve Carr's smart comedy

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: In Terry Gilliam's inventive fantasy, the famed 19th-century writers get caught up in a real-life fairy tale involving a haunted forest where girls have been disappearing. Matt Damon, Heath Ledger, Jonathan Pryce, Monica Bellucci, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey

programme.title: Igby Goes Down
programme.desc: This darkly funny coming-of-age story boasts an outstanding ensemble cast including Susan Sarandon, Bill Pullman, Claire Danes and Jeff Goldblum. Kieran Culkin stars as Igby, a rich teen who rebels against his dysfunctional family, including a yuppie brother (Ryan Phillippe), a tyrannical mother and a mentally ill father. Amanda Peet, Jared Harris

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: Dana Carvey is a private eye who wakes up every morning without a clue where, or who he is. It's like Memento, but with more belly laughs

programme.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
programme.desc: In this filmization of the hit Broadway musical, a popular brothel is threatened with a shutdown by Texas authorities. Burt Reynolds plays the Sheriff, while Dolly Parton portrays the Chicken Ranch madam. While this film has its moments, it never reaches the entertainment heights of its stage predecessor

programme.title: Making of 'Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie'
programme.desc: A look at "Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie," a 2016 adaptation of the popular British sitcom about hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy, who flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. The film stars Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, and is directed by Mandie Fletcher(c)

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: In this utterly unique comedy, a bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: A collector for the mob travels to L.A. to get a payment from a Hollywood producer, and discovers his skills in the world of organized crime translate to the movie business in this showbiz comedy. After helping a producer land a big-name actor for a script, he also helps the compromised man get out of a relationship with a powerful drug dealer

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to recreate a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park

programme.title: Fathers' Day
programme.desc: Mild comedy of errors in which two men from opposite ends of the social spectrum claim to be the father of the same child

programme.title: Double Take
programme.desc: Sharp-suited Daryl Johnson uncovers some financial chicanery in the accounts of a prestigious Mexican client. The next thing he knows is that he's been framed. A confused Daryl does the only thing he can: switch identities with gabbling hustler Freddy Tiffany

programme.title: Eulogy
programme.desc: Writer/director Michael Clancy makes his feature film debut with the black comedy Eulogy. Zooey Deschanel plays Kate Collins, an unhappy college student who is made even more unhappy when her grandfather (Rip Torn) dies. Even though the entire family hates each other, they reunite at the home of Grandma Collins (Piper Laurie). Among other family members, Kate observes a war between her washed-up actor dad, Daniel (Hank Azaria); her lesbian Aunt Lucy (Kelly Preston); her wound-up Uncle Skip (Ray Romano); and her strict Aunt Alice (Debra Winger). Tensions escalate and family secrets are ultimately revealed. Kate is also inundated with the eulogy-writing duties, as she's the only one capable of such a task. Meanwhile, she reunites with old flame Ryan Carmichael (Jesse Bradford). Eulogy premiered at the Sundance Film Festival in 2004

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Veteran male stripper Magic Mike teaches a protégé about seducing women, making big bucks and hard partying in this comedy-drama inspired by Channing Tatum's life before he became an actor

programme.title: Not Another Teen Movie
programme.desc: A parody of teen genre that centres on a high-school athlete who bets he can transform a plain-Jane into a prom queen

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to recreate a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park

programme.title: Beerfest
programme.desc: Humiliated by their German cousins at the Munich Oktoberfest, two American fratboys return for revenge. But this time, they've brought hard-drinking help(n)

programme.title: Louis C.K.: Shameless
programme.desc: The comic performs in Los Angeles. Included: riffs on bumper stickers, Californians, sex and marriage, overweight and skinny people, and a new diversion for fathers. Taped at the Henry Fonda Theater(n)

programme.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
programme.desc: The story of the Chicken Ranch, the whorehouse of the title, and the fight to close it down. The Chicken Ranch has become a part of the Texas scenery and Miss Mona and her girls are in no hurry to leave, particularly as almost everyone in the area wants them to stay. Cue love, songs and Southern moustaches as Sheriff Burt Reynolds and madame Dolly Parton team up to stop a television preacher from closing their business(n)

programme.title: Soapdish
programme.desc: Sally Field and Kevin Kline star in this tale of backstabbing and deceit on an American daytime soap(n)

programme.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
programme.desc: Piano-playing brothers, one a prodigy, the other mediocre, meet a chanteuse who livens up their act but whose affair with one may break them up(n)

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: Powerhouse performances by Jane Fonda, Felicity Huffman and Lindsay Lohan spark this touching and bittersweet saga of three generations of family members dealing with past and present problems, including rape, addictions and promiscuity. Directed by Garry Marshall(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A a meek univeristy student living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: In this amusing fish-out-of-water workplace comedy, a 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy start-up fashion company. Later, he unexpectedly becomes a confidant for the overwhelmed young CEO(n)

programme.title: Super Troopers
programme.desc: "Police Academy" meets "Animal House" in this raucous romp written by and starring the Broken Lizard comedy troupe. Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Paul Soter, Steve Lemme and Erik Stolhanske play Vermont state police officers battling crime and sparring with the local cops, who are trying to get them ousted. Lynda Carter, Daniel von Bargen. Chandrasekhar also directed(n)

programme.title: Saving Silverman
programme.desc: The friendship between Darren, Wayne and JD is broken up when Darren falls under the spell of fiendish bombshell Judith. They plot a rescue plan involving an old flame, former high school coach R Lee Ermey and Neil Diamond(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Best friends, a priest (Norton) and a rabbi (Stiller) both fall in love with the same girl (Elfman). However, neither of the men can pursue the relationship due to their religious beliefs: the priest cannot break his vow of celibacy and the rabbi cannot marry her since she is not Jewish(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A a meek univeristy student living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Sen. Bernie Sanders (Ind.-Vt.) and former representative Barney Frank are the interview guests. The panelists are editors Alex Wagner (Atlantic) and Matt Welch (Reason), and scholar Cornel West(n)

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In this hilarious, offbeat detective story set in 1970 California, a drug-addled PI probes a conspiracy involving his ex-flame and her married, real-estate-developer boyfriend. Along the way, various eccentric characters complicate the investigation(n)

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: Powerhouse performances by Jane Fonda, Felicity Huffman and Lindsay Lohan spark this touching and bittersweet saga of three generations of family members dealing with past and present problems, including rape, addictions and promiscuity. Directed by Garry Marshall(n)

programme.title: Dark Floors
programme.desc: A man and his autistic daughter attempt to escape a hospital overrun by evil monsters. As he fights to find a way out, the father realizes his daughter may be the key to their survival(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Take the Lead
programme.desc: Liz Friedlander's feelgood movie, based on a real-life story, stars Antonio Banderas as Pierre Dulaine, a dance teacher who takes it upon himself to improve the behaviour of the pupils of an inner city school by teaching them ballroom dancing. Facing their expected reluctance, he gets them on side by demonstrating the sensuality of the tango and soon, even the most rebellious class members, including Rock, are tangoing and fox-trotting in preparation for the big dance competition that is looming. Premiere(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A a meek univeristy student living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The sequel to the 2005 blockbuster FANTASTIC FOUR, RISE OF THE SILVER SURFER finds the Marvel superhero quartet of Reed Richards, Sue Storm, Johnny Storm, and Ben Grimm facing an extraterrestrial threat in the form of the title character, an enigmatic being whose presence on Earth could signal the planet's end(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonize her(n)

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration(n)

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily(n)

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: An A-list actor and his posse of best buds navigate the perils and pleasures of Hollywood life(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonize her(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Spy'
programme.desc: A look at "Spy," a 2015 comedy about a CIA analyst thrust into the line of duty to track down a ruthless arms dealer. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne, and is written and directed by Paul Feig(n)

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist plays a game of cat and mouse with an accused murderer who assumed his identity while on the run(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A horrible accident during a school play 20 years prior inspires current students at the school to honor the anniversary by resurrecting the same play. It doesn't take long before they realize that their plan is a deadly mistake. Directed by Travis Cluff and Chris Lofing. Cassidy Gifford, Pfeifer Brown and Ryan Shoos co-star(n)

programme.title: Slither
programme.desc: An alien invasion in a small American town turns locals into flesh-eating zombies. But the uninfected few, led by local sheriff Bill Pardy, band together to try and wipe out the plague before it spreads(n)

programme.title: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
programme.desc: The Chosen One was orphaned at birth by villainous Master Pain. Fully grown (he was raised by rodents), he stalks the Earth in search of his enemy for one last karate showdown. Martial arts spoof inserting comedy dubbing over a cheesy 70s Hong Kong fight flick(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: A powerful, twisting plot is well-realised by confident performances from Michael Douglas and Gwyneth Paltrow in this adaptation of Dial M For Murder. Douglas is slickly despicable as a high-powered businessman who learns that his beautiful wife is having an affair with artist David Shaw. When he learns that Shaw is actually an ex-con with a habit of defrauding rich women, the husband makes an intriguing proposal: he will give the artist half a million dollars in exchange for a single favour - the murder of his wife(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Martian'
programme.desc: A look at "The Martian," a 2015 adaptation of Andy Weir's novel about a lone astronaut who is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry. The film stars Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain and Jeff Daniels, and is directed by Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Every December, safecracker Willie takes a job as a department store Santa. Every Christmas Eve, he robs the store and makes off with a lucrative haul. But is his boozy lifestyle killing his criminal record?(n)

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Kung fu fighter Huo Jaunjia learns to fight honourably with the help of blind beauty Moon. Wushu action based on the life of a martial arts legend(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: Six months have passed since the rage virus has annihilated the British Isles. The U.S. Army declares that the war against infection has been won, and that the reconstruction of the country can begin. As the first wave of refugees return, a family is reunited--but one of them unwittingly carries a terrible secret(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Ice cool Jason Statham transports anything, no questions asked. However, one package could be his undoing in this crime thriller from writer Luc Besson. Contains violence(n)

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Upon release from jail, a con adopts his dead ex-cellmate's identity just to meet the man's girlfriend - but the girl's brother had plans to use the dead con's expert knowledge in a casino robbery, and the imposter is forced to take part. Also known as Reindeer Games(n)

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: Aspiring EDM musician Cole works to hone his craft, and is taken under the wing of a jaded, successful DJ named James. However, the friendship between the two men sours when Cole begins to fall for James' beautiful girlfriend(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Taxicab Confessions
programme.sub-title: All's Fare in Love and Vegas
programme.desc: All's Fare in Love and Vegas. Unsuspecting riders in Las Vegas taxis reveal intimate details of their lives to hidden cameras. Included: a dancer describes her experiences in explicit films; a DJ laments the state of modern music; a gay man discusses his boyfriend of 11 years; an incest victim relates her troubled history(n)

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: A graphic portrayal of life in the underworld of the Little Italy district in New York City. The episodic narrative deals with the experiences and relationships of a petty hoodlum, his epileptic lover, and her unstable cousin who is on the run from a loan shark. Widely acknowledged as one of director Martin Scorsese's best films and one of the landmarks of 1970s cinema

programme.title: Making of 'Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie'
programme.desc: A look at "Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie," a 2016 adaptation of the popular British sitcom about hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy, who flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. The film stars Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, and is directed by Mandie Fletcher(c)

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Nadia is coming back, and Jim has to sharpen up his bedroom act. Stifler tries to chat up the cuties next door, while Finchy still has designs on the rude boy's mum. Includes raunchy additional footage including several more minutes featuring Stifler's lesbian neighbours

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: While in prison, HI McDonnough falls in love with one of the guards. When he's released they try to have a baby. But she can't, so they steal one. They take one from a famous set of quintuplets, but not without a struggle. The film follows our determined couple as they enlist the help of the usual Coen Brothers crew of oddballs to try and keep the baby. Coen fans rate this very highly; Cage is less lugubrious than normal and there are a lot of laughs

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: (2002) Denzel Washington's directorial debut sees him play naval psychiatrist Dr Jerome Davenport with Antwone Fisher (Derek Luke) his latest patient. The young recruit is dangerously violent but as Davenport delves into his background, he discovers the root cause for Fisher's outbursts, leading to a touching family reconciliation

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: Felicity Huffman gives an Oscar-nominated performance as a man on the verge of having a sex-change operation who discovers that he has a 17-year-old son

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: A Dark Crate. Naz is justifiably terrified of his new surroundings at Rikers Island, where an inmate with considerable influence could be crucial to his fate. Meanwhile, Stone visits Naz's parents to negotiate a fee for his services; and Box counsels a police officer on how to write up his report on the night of the arrest

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: The Republican National Convention in Cleveland; Hillary Clinton's running mate; the U.K.'s Foreign Secretary; and campaign songs are discussed

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Enter the Temple. Spencer pursues a big client who's already represented by a powerful rival; Ricky mulls his next move; Tracy lobbies for a bigger role at work; Reggie feels undervalued by Vernon

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Sonny prepares to expand the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel for the Elderly and Beautiful while planning his impending wedding to Sunaina

programme.title: My Depression: The Up and Down and Up of It
programme.desc: An animated, musical adaptation of writer-composer Elizabeth Swados' book depicting her lifelong struggle with depression

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: In this galvanizing feminist drama, a working-class laundress in 19th-century London becomes radicalized when she meets a brave cadre of women who are fighting for the right to vote

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his daughter and estranged wife as a series of massive earthquakes devastate California. Meanwhile, a Cal Tech professor attempts to warn other citizens

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Ben finds the map to a secret treasure hidden by America's founding fathers. He wants to protect the hoard from greedy Ian, and the only way to save it is to beat Ian to the prize

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry Shaw and Rachel Holloman were complete strangers at the beginning of the day, but that changed the instant a strange woman called to threaten both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. Suddenly forced into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, Jerry and Rachel must now take orders from a woman who's using everyday technology to track and control their every move(n)

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: College student Lewis Thomas takes a trip across country to pick up his dream girl, Venna. On the way he is joined by his brother Fuller and together they play a practical joke on a trucker over a CB radio. Now the trucker wants revenge..(n)

programme.title: Standing Still
programme.desc: A popular yet drunken actor reconnects with a group of his college friends for a wedding several years after graduation(n)

programme.title: Summer Catch
programme.desc: Baseball could be the only ticket to success for hard-working Ryan. He wins a spot on the local team, but is caught between his off-field romance with holidaying Tenley and his sporting ambitions. Romcom with a good supporting cast(n)

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain seeks out treasure in the Black Sea, despite a suspicion that he may be deceived(n)

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Four successful men find themselves easing into long-term relationships, but they're not all that comfortable about it, in this intelligent comedy-drama. Terry (Shemar Moore), Jackson (Morris Chestnut), Brian (Bill Bellamy), and Derrick (D.L. Hughley) are four close friends who get together once a week to play basketball and compare notes on their problems with women. And as it turns out, they have a lot to say in that area. Terry has just gotten engaged to BeBe (Susan Dalian), who is more than a bit controlling. Jackson has a deep fear of commitment, symbolized by a recurring dream in which he's attacked by women wearing wedding gowns; what's more, he's started seeing Denise (Gabrielle Union), who he learns once had a fling with his dad (Clifton Powell). Brian is a lawyer who has discovered his next court date will see him pleading a case in front of a judge who used to be his girlfriend (Angelle Brooks). And Derrick's marriage to Sheila (Tamala Jones) is falling apart at the seams. The Brothers also features one-time Jeffersons regular Marla Gibbs, and Jennifer Lewis as Jackson's mother, who may be giving his father a second chance after many years apart(n)

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's warm and assured debut feature is a charming coming-of-age drama following the lives of Monica Wright and Quincy McCall. Both basketball stars for their respective high-school teams, as their careers progress through college and then into the professional leagues, their romance grows (although not without its ups and downs). The film is not just about shooting hoops but the pressure of being a sports star, the expectations young shoulders are expected to bear, and the familial problems that ensue(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teenagers awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organisation hint at a sinister agenda(n)

programme.title: The Astronaut Farmer
programme.desc: An aspiring astronaut who was forced to forsake his dream of exploring space in order to save the family farm begins building his own personal rocket as a means of reaching the stars in this quirky rural drama starring Billy Bob Thornton. There once was a time when Charlie Farmer (Thornton) seemed like a shoo-in for NASA's esteemed astronaut training program. An Air Force pilot who held a degree in aerospace engineering, Charlie was well on his way to blasting off when a family crisis grounded his celestial aspirations. Of course, Charlie's feet may be firmly planted on terra firma these days, but his thoughts are constantly ascending into the clouds and beyond. It's been ten long years since the man who would navigate the stars began tending to the family farm, and during that time, Charlie has dedicated every moment of his spare time to building the rocket that will one day launch him into space. Though his devoted wife, Audie (Virginia Madsen), the pair's three children, Sunshine, Stanley, and Shepard, and even his father-in-law, Hal (Bruce Dern), all support Charlie in achieving his lifelong goal of becoming the nation's first independent astronaut, a last-minute hitch on the eve before the big launch unexpectedly stalls Charlie's countdown. It seems that Charlie's quest to obtain a substantial amount of high-grade rocket fuel has attracted the attention of not only the FBI, but the CIA, the FAA, and the United States military as well. Now, as the powers that be attempt to ground Charlie, citing concerns for civilian safety, a media frenzy descends upon the once-quiet farm as the reluctant renegade hero vows to show his children just how far one's courage and willingness to pursue one's own ideals can get a person when one refuses to give up hope. Northfork writing/directing duo Mark and Michael Polish team up to tell the tale of a man considered an oddity by his neighbors, a criminal by the government, and an inspiration by the media and the people(n)

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: A healthcare tycoon is forced to share his hospital room with a mechanic when both are diagnosed with terminal cancer. The combative pair discover a shared interest in making the most of their remaining time(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Outcast (?)
programme.desc: What Lurks Within(n)

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to time in a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: What Lurks Within. Rev. Anderson becomes increasingly alienated; Sidney's revelation stuns Kyle(n)

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The Dark Knight of Gotham City confronts a dastardly duo: Two-Face and the Riddler(n)

programme.title: Child 44
programme.desc: A Soviet secret-police agent hunts a serial killer who targets young boys. His investigation later reveals an unsettling conspiracy, which pits him against the ruthless government officials behind it(n)

programme.title: Annie Hall
programme.desc: Bittersweet, Academy Award-winning romantic comedy from writer and director Woody Allen. Successful comedian Alvy Singer lives alone in Manhattan, happily dividing his time between stage appearances, visits to the movies and sessions with his analyst. Then Annie Hall appears - a beautiful, insecure woman with a penchant for men's clothing and ambitions to be a singer(n)

programme.title: 5 Flights Up
programme.desc: When an elderly couple discover that their Brooklyn apartment has increased in value, they decide to sell and move to Manhattan. However, they soon learn that relocating won't be easy(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, a celebrated sniper in the American military. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children(n)

programme.title: The Godfather Epic
programme.desc: A chronological version of Francis Ford Coppola's first two films, about the powerful Corleone crime family in America in the first half of the 20th century, contains scenes that were not included in the original theatrical releases(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: What Lurks Within. Rev. Anderson becomes increasingly alienated; Sidney's revelation stuns Kyle(n)

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: After being nominated seven times to the Oscars, Martin Scorsese won the Best Director statuette for this crime thriller starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson and Mark Wahlberg, among other stars. Billy Costigan is a police officer assigned to work undercover with Irish mobster Frank Costello to get evidences to arrest him. On the other side, Colin Sullivan, the informer of Costello, is promoted in the Massachusetts State Police. The Departed also received the Best Picture Academy Award(n)

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding crime thriller, a man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organized-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong(n)

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: After their plane crashes in the Amazon, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rain forest are captured by a tribe of cannibals(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: Director Sam Taylor-Johnson's big screen version of the initial book in the series, Fifty Shades of Grey, stars Dakota Johnson as Anastasia Steele, an English Lit major on the verge of graduation when her best friend, a journalism major, gets sick and asks Anastasia to do an assignment for her -- interview Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan), the wealthy businessman who is speaking at their impending graduation ceremony. The two hit it off right away; the awkward young woman is immediately turned on by his power and control, and he's drawn to her naivete(n)

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Three vampires try to blend into modern society while still feeding their fiendish urges(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: A young suburban girl is abducted by spirits that have besieged her family's home. Desperate, her parents devise a plan to rescue her from the other side(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn Wade sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses, funky music, a hot onboard dance club, and a bathroom attendant(n)

programme.title: Major Payne
programme.desc: Comedy about a soldier who is thrown out of the army and ends up training a group of junior cadets(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Young Greek student Nia Vardalos causes uproar in her exuberant but traditional family when she brings home non-Greek new man John Corbett(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone(n)

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: Inspired by The Canterbury Tales, as well as the story of Ulrich von Lichtenstein, this is the story of William, a young squire with a gift for jousting. After his master dies suddenly, the squire hits the road with his cohorts Roland and Wat. On the journey, they stumble across an unknown writer, Chaucer. William, lacking a proper pedigree, convinces Chaucer to forge genealogy documents that will pass him off as a knight. With his newly-minted history in hand, the young man sets out to prove himself a worthy knight at the country's jousting competition, and finds romance along the way(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Congressman Evan Baxter is settling into a new life of political importance when God appears and tells him to build an ark. Evan thinks he's going mad, but before long, animals and deliveries of wood persuade him that it might be his destiny to be the modern-day Noah after all(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: A mysterious being is found in the pool of an apartment complex. She clearly comes from another world, and it seems she may not be alone. Now the neighbors will have to save her if they are to save themselves from whatever is after her. M. Night Shyamalan works his Academy Award-nominated, spellbinding craftsmanship into an unexpected story that features mesmerizing images, not to mention a breathtaking cast: Bryce Dallas Howard, Paul Giamatti, Jeffrey Wright and Sarita Choudhury(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: Ensemble drama that follows the broken lives of several LA residents(n)

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Former covert operative Bryan Mills must race to protect his daughter while tracking down the criminals who framed him for killing his ex-wife. Meanwhile, the FBI, the CIA and the police are hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, the film follows the heroism of Captain Alexei Vostrikov who, at the height of the Cold War, is ordered to take command of the nuclear missile submarine K-19 away from its original commander Captain Mikhail Polenin. Vostrikov's mission is to quickly ready the ill-prepared sub for her maiden voyage - no matter what the cost. But Vostrikov, Polenin and K-19's loyal crew can never imagine all that is expected of them. Neither can they fathom what the price of failure might be for them and for the world when a nuclear reactor malfunctions, threatening a core meltdown and an explosion that will certainly kill all aboard. As they glide beneath the Arctic seas, it is the crew's collective bravery and Vostrikov's daring embrace of his duty toward his country and his men which will ultimately save K-19... and stave off what surely would have been a nuclear disaster(n)

programme.title: Swimfan
programme.desc: A moment of temptation leads to a high body count and untold regrets for a high-school swimming star in this thriller starring Bring It On's Jesse Bradford and Traffic's Erika Christensen. Despite a shady past involving drugs and the juvenile justice system, Ben Cronin (Bradford) seems to have it all: a loving mother, a devoted girlfriend (Shiri Appleby), and a shot at a college scholarship in California. But the same week that athletic scouts will be deciding his future, Ben finds himself embroiled in a flirtation with Madison Bell (Christensen), a bewitching transfer student who seduces him into supposedly strings-free sex during an impromptu swim lesson after hours in the school pool. When Ben takes Madison at her word and goes about his business as if nothing had happened, she insinuates herself into his life with sinister glee. Showing up at Ben's house, befriending his girlfriend, and sending him naked pictures -- none of her strategies wins his heart. So Madison turns to other, more devious forms of courtship. Soon, Ben finds himself kicked off the swim team for supposed steroid use, suspected of murdering a rival (Clayne Crawford), and rejected by his girlfriend for his sexual indiscretions. Eventually, though, he receives help in uncovering the genesis of Madison's uncanny fixation from an unexpected source. Originally titled "Swimfan85" (after Madison's Internet screen name), the retitled Swimfan hit the top spot at the back-to-school box office when it was released September 6, 2002. Dan Hedaya co-stars as Ben's stern but loving mentor, Coach Simkins. Actor-turned-director John Polson previously helmed Siam Sunset(n)

programme.title: Mr. Baseball
programme.desc: A former American baseball star, now considered a has-been, is signed to play for a Japanese league in this comedy. Cultures clash as the player at first fails to take his new teammates seriously, but he soon finds his love of the game rejuvenated by their fresh perspective(n)

programme.title: Altered States
programme.desc: In this 1980 sci-fi horror film, William Hurt plays Eddie Jessup, a scientist obsessed with discovering mankind's true role in the universe. To this end, he submits himself to a series of mind-expanding experiments. By enclosing himself in a sensory-deprivation chamber and taking hallucinogenic drugs, Jessup hopes to explore different levels of human consciousness, but instead is devolved into an apelike monster. Director Ken Russell helmed Altered States from a script by Paddy Chayefsky, who adapted his own novel of the same name. Unhappy with the finished product, Chayefsky had his name replaced with his pseudonym Sydney Aaron(n)

programme.title: Barb Wire
programme.desc: A bounty hunter's town and business are under siege by warring factions in this futuristic fantasy about comic-book babe Barb Wire(n)

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: While travelling through the Outback, an American travel writer and a group of tourists are terrorised by an enormous killer crocodile(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Prepare for nonstop action when a secret agent recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organization. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: An estranged husband-and-wife treasure hunting team decide to patch up their differences when news breaks of a potentially massive haul of booty on an old shipwreck on an island off the Florida coast. However, the murderous gangster rapper who owns the isle has brought in a rival bounty hunter, forcing the pair to battle against time - and their marital difficulties - if they are to reach the golden galleon(n)

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America(n)

programme.title: The Reaping
programme.desc: Hilary Swank gives a riveting performance in this harrowing chiller. She plays a former missionary who's lost her faith, but now is on a mission to debunk alleged religious "miracles." Her latest investigation finds her in a haunted Louisiana town that's been beset by the 10 Biblical plagues, including invasions of locusts, frogs and lice. David Morrissey, Stephen Rea, Idris Elba, William Ragsdale, John McConnell, AnnaSophia Robb. Directed by Stephen Hopkins(n)

programme.title: Mirrors
programme.desc: An NYPD detective-turned-security guard discovers something sinister lurking in the mirrors of a fire-damaged department store(n)

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Tense thriller about a woman who exposes a web of deceit and murder following her husband's mysterious death. When Adrienne Saunders's apparently perfect husband Jack is killed in an accident, her recent suspicions about his private activities are confirmed. As one shocking disclosure follows another, Adrienne discovers that the man she loved is capable of staging his own death as well as killing others to get what he wants(n)

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Chuck Levine (Adam Sandler) and Larry Valentine (Kevin James) are two New York City firefighters and longtime friends. While widower Larry wants to ensure that his two children will be taken care of if anything should happen to him, bachelor Chuck wants to carry on with his carefree life of noncommitment. Having once been rescued by Larry from certain death, beholden Chuck has vowed to repay the favor when the time is right. So, when Larry discovers that the only means of circumventing the civic red tape that could throw his children's futures into jeopardy is to take Chuck as his lawfully wedded husband, we see a marriage in sight(n)

programme.title: Final Analysis
programme.desc: Psychological thriller set in present day San Francisco: psychiatrist Isaac Barr is treating a patient, Diana Baylor. In order to probe further into the young woman's past, the doctor decides to meet her married older sister, Heather Evans. There is a sexual spark and the two swiftly begin a covert affair, one hiding the relationship from her husband and the other anxious that his patient should not learn of the unethical relationship. But events take a sinister turn when Heather must appear in court on a murder charge(n)

programme.title: Clean and Sober
programme.desc: Detox drama starring Michael Keaton as a fast-living, money-embezzling, drug-taking, alcoholic yuppie who gets into even more trouble when his girlfriend dies of an overdose(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal play Ennis Del Mar and Jack Twist, two young cowboys paired up for a job tending sheep on a Wyoming mountain. As the days go by, their relationship develops until, after a heavy night drinking whisky, they make passionate love. Initially denying the attraction each feels for the other, they go their separate ways at the end of the job. Both marry and have children but meet regularly to slake their undying passion for each other, living desperate, unfulfilled lives between each meeting. But then tragedy strikes. Ang Lee's Oscar-winning drama is a bold, emotional story of a passion that cannot be denied but must be hidden from a world that will only condemn it(n)

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Arthur is a happy drunk with no pretensions at any ambition. He is also the heir to a vast fortune, which he is told will only be his if he marries Susan. He does not love Susan, but she will make something of him. Arthur proposes but then meets another girl, with no money, who he could love(n)

programme.title: Arthur 2: On the Rocks
programme.desc: Arthur is forced to get a job when a bad business deal causes him to lose his fortune(n)

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: An atmospheric phenomenon enables a New York firefighter to communicate with his son 30 years in the future. His son warns him of his death in a warehouse blaze. But changing history triggers a new series of tragic events(n)

programme.title: Murderous Intent
programme.desc: A murder lifts the lid on some disturbing actions among the pupils at a well-respected school in this drama. Nigel (Tom Sturridge), a student at an exclusive British private school, has been found murdered, and police detective McKenzie (Richard Roxburgh) has been assigned to investigate. Alex Forbes (Eddie Redmayne), one of Nigel's classmates who was known to have little fondness for him, is a prime suspect and has been brought in for questioning; however, he refuses to cooperate, and Sally Rowe (Toni Collette), a forensic psychiatrist working with the police, is brought in to talk to the boy. While Alex is initially no more helpful with Sally, in time she's able to find cracks in his resistance, and he begins to discuss his interest in the Knights Templar, a medieval Christian military order. As Alex shares his belief that the benefits of some actions can outweigh their wrongs, Sally learns more about the boy, and her research turns up some surprising facts – Nigel believed both he and Alex were descended from members of the Knights Templar, they may have been responsible for the death of a schoolmate in the interest of gaining mystical powers, and Alex's father (Patrick Malahide), also the headmaster at the school, has some troubling secrets of his own. Like Minds was the first feature film from writer and director Gregory J. Read(n)

programme.title: Milk
programme.desc: True life tale following gay rights activist Harvey Milk as he battles prejudice to become California's first openly homosexual elected official(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal play Ennis Del Mar and Jack Twist, two young cowboys paired up for a job tending sheep on a Wyoming mountain. As the days go by, their relationship develops until, after a heavy night drinking whisky, they make passionate love. Initially denying the attraction each feels for the other, they go their separate ways at the end of the job. Both marry and have children but meet regularly to slake their undying passion for each other, living desperate, unfulfilled lives between each meeting. But then tragedy strikes. Ang Lee's Oscar-winning drama is a bold, emotional story of a passion that cannot be denied but must be hidden from a world that will only condemn it(n)

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet are the lovers aboard the doomed ocean liner in James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic blockbuster. Strong language/sex/flashing images(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Night of the Crash. In the Season 3 premiere, the clan deals with the loss of a family member

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: An unlikely romance develops between a charming bank robber and a beautiful federal marshal after his escape from prison---but they once again find themselves on opposite sides of the law when the police learn of a diamond heist planned by the fugitive and his colorful partners in crime. Based on the novel by Elmore Leonard. George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames, Don Cheadle

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: Jim Carrey is the cop with a Jekyll and Hyde complex. A Farrelly Brothers comedy that takes every sacred cow in the book, and then shoots it

programme.title: GoldenEye
programme.desc: James Bond must unmask the mysterious head of the Janus Syndicate and prevent his one time ally - Alec Trevelyan Agent 006 - from utilising the GoldenEye weapons system to inflict devastating revenge on Britain

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: In this delightful animated film, emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist named Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) gets a shot at redemption when his mentor (Michael Douglas) asks him to protect a superpowered suit. Donning the stunning technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention, and organizes a heist that could save the world. Peyton Reed directs this high-octane superhero flick

programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally

programme.desc: Conspiracy thriller starring Jeff Bridges as Professor Michael Faraday who teaches the activity of extreme right-wing groups. Recovering from the death of his wife, an FBI agent, he warms to his new neighbours, Oliver and Cheryl Lang. But their strange behaviour concerns him. Confused by their friendship and muddled by paranoia, he discovers some terrifying evidence that threatens the safety of his remaining family(n)

programme.desc: Flamboyant Austrian fashionista Brüno, the the self-proclaimed voice of Austrian youth TV, takes his show to America(n)

programme.title: Boogeyman
programme.desc: Haunted by the memory of seeing his father killed by a closet-dwelling monster, a man returns to his childhood home years later to face his fears. But is the creature real or was it all in his mind? Barry Watson stars in this stylish horror-thriller. Emily Deschanel, Skye McCole Bartusiak, Lucy Lawless(n)

programme.title: The Guardian
programme.desc: Haunted by a fatal crash in which he lost his crew, a legendary Coast Guard rescue swimmer becomes a trainer and reluctantly mentors a cocky new recruit in this rousing action film(n)

programme.title: Jetsons: The Movie
programme.desc: Full-length animated feature following the far-out exploits of space-age family the Jetsons, a big-screen expansion of the popular '60s Hanna-Barbera cartoon series(n)

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: There's a wonderful wealth of dancing and romancing in this teen tale of a Baltimore tough guy who teams with a haughty ballerina for a dance competition at her prestigious private school(n)

programme.title: STARZ Insider: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A preview of the 2016 remake of "Ghostbusters," starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon and Leslie Jones as the paranormal investigators(n)

programme.title: Into the Woods
programme.desc: A witch curses a baker and his wife, binding their fates to those of numerous fairy tale characters including Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Rapunzel and Jack of "Jack and the Beanstalk" in this Stephen Sonheim musical(n)

programme.title: From Russia with Love
programme.desc: Super-spy James Bond finds his life under threat when he aids Tatiana Romanova, a beautiful Russian woman who wants to defect to the West with a politically invaluable cipher machine. It soon becomes apparent that Tatiana is being used as a pawn by SPECTRE, a group of international criminals intent on finishing off 007 once and for all(n)

programme.title: The Guardian
programme.desc: Haunted by a fatal crash in which he lost his crew, a legendary Coast Guard rescue swimmer becomes a trainer and reluctantly mentors a cocky new recruit in this rousing action film(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in co-existence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teenagers must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: Austin is back to stop Dr. Evil, who now has a assistance in the form of, 'Mini Me'. Hilarious British spy parody, also starring Will Ferrell and Heather Graham(n)

programme.title: Goldfinger
programme.desc: Beginning innocently enough with a murder, James Bond finds himself investigating Auric Goldfinger, a gold dealer who the Bank of England suspects is stockpiling huge amounts of gold bullion. However, he soon uncovers a far more sinister plot called Operation Grand Slam and has a fair bit of bowler-hat-dodging to do from Goldfinger's manservant, Oddjob(n)

programme.title: From Russia with Love
programme.desc: Super-spy James Bond finds his life under threat when he aids Tatiana Romanova, a beautiful Russian woman who wants to defect to the West with a politically invaluable cipher machine. It soon becomes apparent that Tatiana is being used as a pawn by SPECTRE, a group of international criminals intent on finishing off 007 once and for all(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in co-existence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teenagers must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: A former biker and drug dealer single-handedly takes on the nefarious Lord's Resistance Army in a noble bid to save young Sudanese refugees from a life of violence and suffering. Inspired by actual events, Marc Forster's Machine Gun Preacher stars Gerard Butler as Sam Childers, a tough-as-nails biker whose heart shatters upon witnessing the harrowing plight of children in Sudan. Determined that no child shall be enslaved by the brutal Lord's Resistance Army, Childers turns to God for inspiration, and establishes an orphanage for wounded kids and child soldiers. When the Lord's Resistance Army refuses to stand down, Childers organizes a militia to protect the children. In helping to give the orphans of war-torn Sudan a better future, the former outlaw begins to find new meaning in his own life as well

programme.title: Easy Rider
programme.desc: Highly influential 1960s road movie that follows the mind-expanding trip of two bikers from Los Angeles to New Orleans, with an alcoholic lawyer in tow. Dir: Dennis Hopper

programme.title: A Birder's Guide to Everything
programme.desc: A teenage birder spots a supposedly extinct duck and leads his friends on a wild road trip to get proof in this uplifting coming-of-age comedy. Along the way, he falls in love and prepares for his widowed father's impending wedding

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: In this exciting adventure set in 1960s China, a student from Beijing is sent to teach a nomadic tribe in Mongolia. While there, he cares for and adopts a wolf cub, and their bond causes him to see the world in a new light

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Environmental activist Albert hires two 'existential detectives' to find out what's keeping him awake at night. They discover that Albert's mind is haunted by handsome rival, corporate PR exec Brad. But does Brad need more help than Albert?

programme.title: Man on Wire
programme.desc: On August 7, 1974, a 23-year-old Frenchman took the whole world by surprise when he walked on a thin wire strung between the Twin Towers, over 400 meters above the ground. Philippe Petit had been dreaming about the towers for six years and had spent eight months in New York planning the masterstroke. With the help of friends and other collaborators, Petit was able to get around the security of the World Trade Center, bringing inside the heavy steel wire as well as all the necessary equipment for the exploit, and stringing the wire across the two towers. Oscar® winner for best documentary in 2009, James Marsh¿s film narrates an extraordinary adventure featuring the testimony of the protagonist, the young tightrope walker who surprised the world with his high-wire walk across New York¿s twin towers, delivering an unparalleled, unique show that became known as the artistic crime of the century.¿

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: The life of designer Yves Saint Laurent is depicted in this biopic

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: Operatic martial-arts action, breathtaking scenery and Oscar-nominated cinematography propel "Hero" director Zhang Yimou's thrilling adventure about government agents trying to root out rebels in 9th-century China. Zhang Ziyi, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Andy Lau, Song Dandan

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: A former biker and drug dealer single-handedly takes on the nefarious Lord's Resistance Army in a noble bid to save young Sudanese refugees from a life of violence and suffering. Inspired by actual events, Marc Forster's Machine Gun Preacher stars Gerard Butler as Sam Childers, a tough-as-nails biker whose heart shatters upon witnessing the harrowing plight of children in Sudan. Determined that no child shall be enslaved by the brutal Lord's Resistance Army, Childers turns to God for inspiration, and establishes an orphanage for wounded kids and child soldiers. When the Lord's Resistance Army refuses to stand down, Childers organizes a militia to protect the children. In helping to give the orphans of war-torn Sudan a better future, the former outlaw begins to find new meaning in his own life as well

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: The first film by writer/director David O. Russell since 1999's Three Kings finds the filmmaker working with an ensemble cast that includes Dustin Hoffman, Lily Tomlin, Jude Law, Naomi Watts, and Mark Wahlberg. Hoffman and Tomlin are a married couple who run a detective agency focusing on existential troubles. Law and Watts play another couple who enlist their services. Isabelle Huppert, Jason Schwartzman, and Kevin Dunn round out the ensemble(n)

programme.title: Three...Extremes
programme.desc: A trio of frighteningly good horror tales, directed by Asian maestros Takashi Miike (Japan), Fruit Chan (Hong Kong) and Chan-wook Park (Korea), puts viewers on edge of their seats---or covering their eyes in terror. One of them, Chan's "Dumplings," about a mysterious woman (Bai Ling) whose delectable delicacies have rejuvenating powers that reverse the aging process, was expanded into a full-length feature film. Miriam Yeung, Tony Ko-Fai Leung, Lee Byung-Hun(n)

programme.title: The Filth and the Fury
programme.desc: Although their initial career lasted only 26 months, the Sex Pistols changed the music scene forever. This intimate and shocking portrait of the notorious punk rock band documents their rise from the streets of 70's London through their crucifixion by the tabloids, canonization by fans around the world and ultimately their implosion on tour in America(n)

programme.desc: Adventure in which Mikhail Baryshnikov plays a Soviet ballet star who finds himself back in the USSR after a defection attempt misfires. In desperation, he teams up with an expatriate American tap dance and together they plot their bid to return to freedom(n)

programme.desc: Miles is distressed about his lack of success as a novelist, and Jack is an equally unsuccessful actor with a rapidly approaching wedding. Now in order to get back on their feet, they are both forced into uncomfortable living arrangements that put their union to the ultimate test(n)

After an encounter with a British soldier, she's kidnapped by a group of Scottish Highlanders whose ranks include an injured young man named Jamie(n)

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: In this historical drama, idealistic German public prosecutor Johann Radmann (Alexander Fehling) becomes interested in the case of Charles Schulz, a former Nazi officer at Auschwitz who is now a schoolteacher. Radmann initially encounters resistance from the rest of his department when he begins his investigation, but senior prosecutor Walter Friedberg (Robert Hunger-Buhler) ultimately allows him to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp. Helmed by first-time feature-film director Giulio Ricciarelli, Labyrinth of Lies is based on the Frankfurt Auschwitz trials, a previously lesser-known chapter of Germany's post-WWII history in which the country was forced to reckon with the Nazis who returned to everyday life following the end of the war. Germany's official Foreign Language submission for the 2016 Academy Awards. Friederike Becht, Andre Szymanski, and Hansi Jochmann co-star(n)

programme.desc: Tyler Perry-style uplift meets attitude in popular playwright-turned-moviemaker David Talbert's urban-themed comedy. They take the choir and church officials hostage in hopes of unmasking the thief in holier-than-thou clothing(n)

programme.desc: Three-time Emmy nominee Eriq La Salle ("ER") makes his feature directorial debut with this ambitious adaptation of co-screenwriter Jeremy Leven's novel about a controversial doctor (Michael Beach) who is challenged by an enigmatic patient (La Salle) during the filming of a documentary at a state psychiatric hospital. Ronny Cox, John C. McGinley, Sinbad, Tia Texada(n)

programme.title: Lightning in a Bottle
programme.desc: B.B. King, Solomon Burke and Buddy Guy are just a few of the terrific performers at this electrifying salute to the blues, recorded at Radio City Music Hall in February 2003. The film also features backstage interviews with the artists and archival footage of legends Muddy Waters, Howlin' Wolf and John Lee Hooker. programme.title: An American Tail: The Mystery of the Night Monster (?)
To Sir, With Love II
programme.desc: Peter Bogdanovich directed this made-for-TV sequel to the well-remembered 1967 drama To Sir With Love. After 30 years as a teacher in a rough-and-tumble London school, Mark Thackeray (Sidney Poitier) finally retires and returns to America, settling into what he imagines will be a quiet life in Chicago. But Thackeray soon discovers that the nearby high school is not unlike the school he left behind in London -- run down, lacking discipline, and in dire need of teachers who genuinely care about their students. Thackeray decides to volunteer his services to the school, and soon finds himself teaching a history class to the toughest students he's ever had to face. Lulu and Judy Geeson, who starred as Poitier's students in the first film, make cameo appearances in To Sir With Love II, with Daniel J. Travanti and Jeff Sill highlighting the supporting cast of the sequel(n)

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Nuclear testing once again awakens a green behemoth. However, this large iguana-like creature seems to be unrelated to its Japanese counterpart. The lizard proceeds to demolish large portions of New York as the US military attempts to destroy it(n)

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: Comedy in which the TV family of the 1970s is transplanted to 90s LA. All six members of the family are still living as though it was the 70s, which causes problems when Mike tries to pitch for a new contract, Marcia goes on the run and Peter starts to go through puberty(n)

programme.title: Gawayn
programme.desc: Supersized Rex. The Duke accidentally turns Rex into a giant who, in turn, turns on him(n)

programme.title: The Final Season
programme.desc: A place where baseball is more than just a game fights to hold on to the national pastime in this drama inspired by a true story. Norway, IA, is a little town where folks take baseball seriously -- so much so that even though Norway's high school boasts less than a hundred students, their baseball team has brought home the state championship 19 times. Jim Van Scoyoc (Powers Boothe), Norway High's baseball coach, has received national attention for his skill with players, and when passionate baseball fan Kent Stock (Sean Astin) lands a teaching position nearby, he volunteers to work as an assistant for Van Scoyoc. While Stock cherishes his time with Van Scoyoc, he takes a job working in Saint Louis, where he plans to move with his fiancée. However, he changes his plans when he gets some unexpected news -- due to shrinking enrollment and budget cuts, Norway's high school is soon to close, and their upcoming baseball season is likely to be their last. Over the fierce objections of his girlfriend, Stock passes on the job in St. Louis to spend one last spring in Norway and help Van Scoyoc as he takes one last shot at taking his team to the state championship. Meanwhile, the citizens of Norway wage a legal battle to keep the school open, and the state sends a lawyer, Polly Hudson (Rachael Leigh Cook), to Norway to represent them. While Stock and Hudson are bitter enemies at the start of the season, with time she begins to understand the sense of tradition and love of the game that fuels Stock and the people of Norway. Also featuring Larry Miller, Tom Arnold, and Michael Angarano, The Final Season received its world premiere at the 2007 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: College Football Playoff National Championship
programme.desc: The offensive firepower, excitement and surprises of the 2016 College Football Playoff National Championship at University of Phoenix Stadium in Glendale, Arizona. All of the thrilling plays from Alabama's 45-40 victory over the ACC Conference champion Clemson Tigers are included, as well as analysis from the big game and the postgame trophy presentations. Key moments include Adam Griffith's momentum-shifting second-half onside kick with the score tied at 24 apiece, and two lengthy touchdowns catches from Crimson Tide tight end (and the game's Offensive MVP) O.J. Howard
